content: Wait a second here, John Jozsa. Didn’t you read a post of mine 10 days ago and say the same thing, that it wasn’t funny and that I was a disgrace? Yeah, it was you. I thought we agreed back then that you hated my stuff and would not be reading me again? So now I must conclude that you are either a masochist or a liar, John. Or a bot troll? Are you a bot troll? –AI
